author: dkhaywood
msg: Introduced isCollection() on NakedObjectSpecification, and factored out all the calls to obtain a CollectionFacet from an object's specification
into a helper CollectionFacetUtils class (in noa-architecture)

author: dkhaywood
msg: Gone through every call to isParseable(), and made following changes:
a) those in the viewers should stay
b) those in the object store persistor should be looking at isAggregated()
c) those in serialization and the XmlSnapshot should be using isEncodeable()
